    Crypto Christopher Walken 12-Jan-19 08:48 PM
    Welcome to Proof of Walken! If you're a new miner I recommend you do some reading on https://www.1stminingrig.com, it's a great resource. Here is a beginner's guide to Spec Mining https://whalereports.com/proof-of-walken-the-dangers-of-spec-mining-and-what-you-need-to-know/ If you want to check out some starter builds, these will get you going: https://whalereports.com/proof-of-walken-mining-for-550/ https://whalereports.com/proof-of-walken-walken-approved-builds-6-card-rx-570-build/ https://whalereports.com/proof-of-walken-walken-approved-builds-2-card-rx-580-rig/ https://whalereports.com/proof-of-walken-walken-approved-builds-2-card-1070ti-build/ If you need help finding coins or what's profitable, check these out: GPU https://www.whattomine.com https://www.cryptunit.com https://www.crypto-coinz.net/crypto-calculator/ https://www.coinwarz.com/calculators https://cointomine.today/ ASICS https://www.asicminervalue.com Ditch Windows and use HIVEOS https://hiveos.farm?ref=81171 Hiveos tutorials https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PBJdC5wHOOY&list=PLqLAWORR4NMwXh3h5Rwso34s4OWK7Lo-S Check out my website H4SHR8 https://h4shr8.com/collections/merch If you have questions on any of this just ask! (edited)
